text:
@BarbraStreisand One can only imagine, Barbra... I mean, Queen Hillary would have stood on top of the Statue of Liberty and squashed coronavirus with a wave of her blessed hand.  

I wonder, however, as a "mother" and "grandmother," why Hillary seems to have no issue with murdering unborn babies
